job_tasks.phrase: You will figure out the best methods of prompting our AI to accomplish a wide range of tasks
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activity of designing and refining prompts for AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: custom train models to our customer's needs.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the task of training or adapting models for specific customer requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: demonstrate prompt engineering or custom modelling on LLMs or image generation models
job_tasks.justification: This refers to practical experience and projects involving prompt engineering and custom model training.

job_tasks.phrase: experimenting with ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models and showing that you've managed to get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts.
job_tasks.justification: This describes hands-on experience with specific LLMs and the process of crafting prompts to achieve desired outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Discover, test, and document best practices for a wide range of tasks relevant to our customers.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves exploring and defining effective prompting strategies for various use cases.

job_tasks.phrase: Build a set of tutorials and interactive tools that teach the art of prompt engineering to our customers.
job_tasks.justification: This involves creating educational content focused on prompt engineering techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Helping in modelling the tone of voice of our customers in their custom trained models.
job_tasks.justification: This task directly relates to fine-tuning models to achieve a specific characteristic (tone of voice) for customers.

soft_skills.phrase: this is a brand new position in which you learn invaluable lessons in an industry that is changing the world!
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the opportunity for learning and growth in a rapidly evolving field.

soft_skills.phrase: If you have existing projects that demonstrate prompt engineering or custom modelling on LLMs or image generation models, we'd love to see them.
soft_skills.justification: Encourages candidates to showcase their initiative and prior work in the relevant domain.

soft_skills.phrase: If you haven't done much in the way of prompt engineering yet, you can best demonstrate your prompt engineering skills by spending some time experimenting with ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models and showing that you've managed to get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts.
soft_skills.justification: Suggests a proactive approach to learning and skill development for candidates new to prompt engineering.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses almost exclusively on tasks related to Generative AI, specifically prompt engineering and custom model training (Macro-Category B). There are no mentions of traditional software development, integration, or MLOps (Macro-Category A). Therefore, the role is best classified as a specialist in GenAI.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very specific about the tasks involved, which are clearly defined within the GenAI Specialization category (Prompt Engineering & Model Development). There is no ambiguity regarding the core responsibilities, leading to high confidence in the profile assignment.
